posts.title: Defesa Civil Estadual capacita agentes municipais em plataforma sobre desastres
posts.text: A Defesa Civil Estadual promoveu hoje (06) capacitação de agentes da Região Metropolitana no Sistema Integrado de Informações sobre Desastres (S2ID). O treinamento, realizado no Centro Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Rio Grande do Norte (IFRN) de Parnamirim, foi a última etapa dentre as que vêm sendo realizadas desde agosto passado, em todo o estado, pela Defesa Civil. Com a capacitação, a Defesa Civil Estadual pretende fazer com que os municípios agilizem a comunicação de emergência em virtude da seca, para que o Governo Federal, através do Ministério da Integração Nacional, possa liberar recursos que ajudem na adoção de medidas que minimizem os efeitos da estiagem prolongada. A plataforma integra dados regionais e nacionais essenciais para proteção, prevenção, resposta e reconstrução de áreas afetadas com objetivo de qualificar e dar transparência à gestão de riscos e desastres no Brasil. A Chefe do Gabinete Civil, Tatiana Mendes Cunha, esteve presente e ressaltou a importância do curso, que fortalece as ações da Defesa Civil no Rio Grande do Norte.

thread.title: Kuşadası Ticaret Odası 3. Turizm Şurası’nda temsil edildi
thread.title_full: Kuşadası Ticaret Odası 3. Turizm Şurası’nda temsil edildi | Erzurum Flaş Haber

posts.author: erzurumflas.com
posts.title: Kuşadası Ticaret Odası 3. Turizm Şurası’nda temsil edildi
posts.text:
Kültür ve Turizm Bakanlığı tarafından organize edilen 3.Turizm Şurası Ankara’da yapıldı. Şura’ya, Kuşadası Ticaret Odası Genel Sekreteri Burhan Sezer ve Kuşadası Turizm ve Tanıtma Derneği Başkanı-Mali Danışman Mustafa Oğuzkaan katıldı.
Turizm sektörünün mevcut durumunun değerlendirilmesi ve geleceğe yönelik ulusal bir turizm politikasının oluşturulabilmesi amacıyla düzenlenen 3. Turizm Şurasına katılanlar arasında; kamu kurum ve kuruluşları, turizm meslek örgütleri, sivil toplum kuruluşları, turizm sektörü temsilcileri ve akademisyenler yer aldı.
Çevreye duyarlı, dünya gerçekleri ile uyumlu, turizm sektörünün taleplerini cevaplandırabilecek sürdürülebilir turizm politikalarının tartışılması ile turizm sektöründeki yeni eğilimleri de yakalayarak geleceğe yönelik izlenecek politikaların değerlendirilebilmesi amacıyla düzenlenen 3. Turizm Şûrası kapsamında; Turizm Politikaları, Turizmde Örgütlenme ve Destinasyon Yönetimi, Turizmde Ürün Çeşitliliği ve Sürdürülebilirlik, Çevre-Planlama-Altyapı, Yatırım-Teşvik-Finansman, Konaklama Sektörü, Seyahat Acentacılığı ve Ulaşım, Tanıtma ve Pazarlama, Dijital Turizm ve İnovasyon, Turizm Eğitimi, İstihdamı ve Turist Rehberliği, Yerel Yönetimler ve Turizm, İç Turizm, Gastronomi Turizmi olmak üzere 13 Komisyon oluşturuldu.
Açılış Konuşmasını Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan’ın yaptığı Şura’da Bakanlar oturumu gerçekleştirildi ve Şura Komisyonlarının çalışarak kendi komisyonları ile ilgili aldıkları kararlar, Şura’nın son günü okundu. Şura’nın kapanış konuşması Kültür ve Turizm Bakanı Numan Kurtulmuş tarafından yapıldı.
“Tam Zamanı” sloganıyla gerçekleştirilen Şura’da Kuşadası Ticaret Odası tarafından, Kültür ve Turizm Bakanlığı Tanıtma Genel Müdürü İrfan Önal ile görüşülerek, Oda tarafından Kuşadası’nın tanıtımı ile ilgili yapılan çalışmalar hakkında bilgiler aktarıldı ve destek istendi. Önal’a Kuşadası İllüstrasyon Haritası ve Kuşadası Prestij kitabı armağan edildi.

thread.title: Collaborazione LARA HEMP
thread.title_full: Collaborazione LARA HEMP

posts.author: mary mary (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Collaborazione LARA HEMP
posts.text:
Buondì ragazze e bentrovate come sempre nel mio blog. Oggi vi voglio parlare ci una bellissima collaborazione che ho avuto il piacere di fare, e devo dire che mi ha colpito positivamente per la grande qualità dei prodotti che propone e che gentilmente mi ha inviato per poterli testare. Sto parlando dell'azienda  

                                         LARA HEMP 

specializzata nella creazioni di prodotti che provengono da una pianta che ha sfamato, curato, vestito e fatto viaggiare il mondo per secoli, sto parlando della canapa. Come sappiamo l'organismo non riesce a produrre gli acidi grassi polinsaturi essenziali che sono : linoleico, linoleico e gammalinolenico . Tali grassi acidi , omega3 , omega 6 e GLA  sono vitamine liposolubili e devono essere fornite dall'alimentazione perchè vengono sintetizzati dall'organismo. L'organismo ne assume quindi benefici come " cibo funzionale e non come integratore dietetico. E quindi attraverso questi prodotti che come ingrediente principale hanno la canapa aiuta il nostro organismo ad assumere questi grassi. 
Vi faccio vedere alcuni prodotti che l'azienda mi ha inviato e che ho trovato davvero buonissimi. 







 Che dire grande azienda , grandi prodotti, personalmente li consiglio tantissimi, molti magari sono scettici, ma vi posso assicurare che oltre ad essere dei grandi prodotti curati nei minimi dettagli, e prodotti da personale qualificato e professionale, apportano solo dei benefici al nostro organismo. Potete visitare il sito, e troverete tantissimi altri prodotti per tutti i gusti e per tutte le esigenze. Non mi resta che attendere il vostro giudizio e fatemi sapere attraverso i commenti cosa ne pensate, io trovo che sia una novità davvero eccezionale e che se fino ad oggi ha avuto un grande successo è perchè davvero merita di averlo. 
Alla prossima come sempre con tante altre novità e proposte per voi, bacii... 

                                            SITO LARA HEMP

posts.text:
I felt really groggy and gross all day - like when you haven't had enough sleep and have been eating only crap. If I had to do the three hour, I was planning to take off from work.
Our office calls in two days if you failed. I called today to confirm, because I'm heading out of town soon and found out I passed. I think the nurse was laughing at how relieved I was by those results.
Good luck, all.
ETA: The drink for me was the easy; the hard part was dealing with the side effects the rest of the day.

thread.title_full: ​Starc: Mitchell Starc makes history with two hat-tricks in one game | Cricket News - Times of India

posts.author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
posts.title: ​Starc: Mitchell Starc makes history with two hat-tricks in one game | Cricket
posts.text: Mitchell Starc makes history with two hat-tricks in one game Mitchell Starc makes history with two hat-tricks in one game Mitchell Starc became only the eighth player in first-class cricket history -- and the first in 39 years -- to achieve the feat as he spearheaded New South Wales to victory over Western Australia in the Sheffield Shield. AFP | Nov 7, 2017, 14:38 IST Highlights Starc removed Behrendorff, Moody and Mackin in WA's first innings to complete his first career hat-trick. Starc then got both Behrendorff and Moody again off the final two deliveries of his 15th over. Jono Wells then edged Starc on the first ball of his next over to Steve Smith at first slip to end the match. Starc finished with match figures of 7/97. (Getty Images) Related Videos Starc takes two hat-tricks in ... SYDNEY: Strike bowler Mitchell Starc became the first man to take two hat-tricks in the same first-class game in Australia on Tuesday as he hit ominous form ahead of the Ashes Test series against England. The left-arm pacer became only the eighth player in first-class cricket history -- and the first in 39 years -- to achieve the feat as he spearheaded New South Wales to victory over Western Australia in the Sheffield Shield. Having removed Jason Behrendorff, David Moody and Simon Mackin in WA's first innings to complete his first career hat-trick, Starc then got both Behrendorff and Moody again off the final two deliveries of his 15th over. Jono Wells then edged Starc on the first ball of his next over to Australia and NSW captain Steve Smith at first slip to end the match. Starc finished with the match figures of seven for 97 in NSW's 171-run victory. He also took a career-best 8-73 for NSW against South Australia under lights at Adelaide Oval and looks in ominous touch ahead of the Test series. Australia take on England in the first of five Ashes Test matches in Brisbane, starting on November 23. Australian leg-spinner Jimmy Matthews remains the only player to take two hat-tricks in a Test match after he did it against South Africa in Manchester in 1912.

thread.title: 12 - Everyone Loves Hugo
thread.title_full: Season 6 Episode 12 - Everyone Loves Hugo - MyMedia-Forum.com

posts.author: Dew
posts.title: 12 - Everyone Loves Hugo
posts.text:
Dedicated to the memory of ozanna
Episode 12  Everyone Loves Hugo
Written by: Edward Kitsis and Adam Horowitz
Directed by: Dan Atlas
 with MR. Chang giving a presentation of Hugo. Various pictures and video are shown in the background as he speaks.]
MR. CHANG : In a world of conflict and strife there is but one fact we all can agree upon. Everybody loves Hugo.
[Applause]
MR. CHANG : Born to humble surroundings Hugo Reyes has always been a beacon of light for all who crossed his path.
[These pictures are part of the slideshow:
Hurley as an adult
Baby Hugo being held by his mother
Baby Hugo sitting up on his own,
Outside of Mr. Cluck's Chicken,
Hurley holding a box of chicken inside one of the stores,
Eiffel Tower.]
MR. CHANG : Hugo's lifelong love affair with chicken led him to acquire and then expand the Mr. Cluck's Chain into a worldwide phenomenon. The exponential growth of Hugo's success was startling but the financial success wasn't the end, it was the beginning.
[More of the slideshow:
Snow capped mountain,
Great Pyramid at Giza,
Video of Hurley shaking hands at a ground breaking ceremony Hurley wearing a Humane Society t-shirt and holding a Chihuahua]
MR. CHANG : Hugo and giving became synonymous: parks, playgrounds, hospitals, the Mr. Cluck's house for children, the philanthropy was unparalleled which brings us to this evening...
[More of the slideshow:
Hugo at the zoo with children
Another ground breaking ceremony,
Outside a hospital,
Ribbon cutting for Mr. Cluck's house for children
Experimental Farm
Hugo in a hard hat.]
[The scene is now of a large room where the presentation/dinner is being held.]
MR. CHANG : ...and the opening of the Hugo Reyes Paleontology Wing at the Golden State Natural History Museum, a lasting beacon of culture that bears the name of one of our city's greatest benefactors. Ladies and gentlemen, our Man of the Year [pause] Hugo Reyes!
[The spotlight is focused on Hurley and everyone applauds. He stands up and looks around the room. The people are cheering. Hurley leaving the event carrying his trophy of a frosted glass T-Rex.]
HURLEY : It's a pretty cool trophy, huh?
MRS. REYES : Mm hmm, Hugo.
HURLEY : Oh, you know we got the Human Fund next Saturday night. Can you make it?
MRS. REYES : Another trophy. Everybody loves Hugo. You know who doesn't? [pause] Women.
HURLEY : Ma!
MRS. REYES : You need a woman in your life, especially one who has not nursed you.
HURLEY : That's disgusting [pause] and I'm too busy to meet someone.
MRS. REYES : You're not too busy. You're too scared.
HURLEY : I'm not scared.
MRS. REYES : Good, because you have a date tomorrow.
HURLEY : I do?
MRS. REYES : Grandpa Tito's neighbor's daughter, Rosalita. She agreed to lunch with you.
HURLEY : What's she like?
MRS. REYES : [rolls eyes] Willing to meet you.
HURLEY : Ma.
MRS. REYES : [raises voice] You're going! [caresses Hurley's cheek] She's gonna love you and if she doesn't we will find someone who does.
[Mrs. Reyes lightly slaps Hurley's cheek. A partial time skip is heard and the scene switches back to the island. Hurley is standing in front of a grave where he replaces a red ginger stem with a flower. The mast part of the wooden cross reads Libby. He kneels down.]
HURLEY : A lot of crazy stuff's been happening. I kinda wish I could talk to you about it in person. A lot of people have come to talk to me after they've [pause] you know, gone. It would be nice if you did, too.
ILANA : Hugo.
[Ilana approaches Hurley while he is still kneeling.]
ILANA : Are you ready to go? Once I'm back, we're leaving.
HURLEY : Where ya goin'?
ILANA : The Black Rock. If we're gonna destroy that plane, we'll need dynamite.
HURLEY : You sure that's the right move?
ILANA : No, but it's the only move we have.
HURLEY : Well, you're the expert.
ILANA : Whose grave is this?
HURLEY : Her name was Libby. She was in the tail section of the plane. We were gonna have our first date. It was gonna be like, a picnic but, [pause] then she was murdered.
ILANA : I'm sorry.
[Ilana walks away.]
HURLEY : Yeah, me, too.
[As Hurley remains at the gravesite silently, he hears whispers around him. He looks around and is interrupted.]
MICHAEL : Hey!
[Hurley stands up and is face to face with Michael.]
HURLEY : What are you doing here?
MICHAEL : I'm here to stop you from getting everyone killed.
LOST Logo
[Hurley and Michael silently look at each other.]
MICHAEL : You gonna say something?
HURLEY : [long pause] And why should I trust you? You murdered Libby and Ana Lucia.
MICHAEL : That doesn't matter right now. What matters is you going across that island to blow up that plane. People are gonna die, a lot of people, and it's gonna be your fault.
HURLEY : What?
MICHAEL : Because people are listening to you now, Hurley.
JACK : Hurley.
[Hurley turns to see Jack walking toward him.]
JACK : Who are you talking to?
HURLEY : Um, no one.
JACK : Come on, we're leaving.
 off island. Hurley is sitting at a table in a Mexican restaurant eating tortilla chips. The waiter approaches him.]
WAITER : Can I get you some more homemade tortilla chips?
HURLEY : Sure, whatever.
[The waiter starts to remove the second place setting.]
HURLEY : Uh, can you leave those? I'm meeting someone. She's running late.
[The waiter returns the silverware to the table and takes the chip basket.]
WAITER : Right. Chips are on the way.
[Hurley picks up the menu and looks through it.]
WOMAN : Hugo?
[Hurley looks up from the menu and is awestruck.]
HURLEY : Uh, hi, nice to meet you.
[Hurley stands up.]
HURLEY : Wow, uh, I wasn't expecting someone like you.
[Hurley walks around the table to pull the chair from the table so she may sit.]
WOMAN : uh, I'm sorry?
HURLEY : You know, someone who's so [pause] pretty. Please, have a seat.
[Hurley sits back down.]
HURLEY : You don't look like a Rosalita.
LIBBY : Oh, um, my name isn't Rosalita. It's Libby.
HURLEY : So, you're not my blind date?
LIBBY : No, I, I just saw you from across the room.
HURLEY : Well, how'd you know my name?
LIBBY : Well, if I tell you, you're gonna think I'm crazy.
HURLEY : No, I won't.
[Libby moves her hands across the table and hold Hurley's hands.]
LIBBY : Hugo, do you believe that two people can be connected, like soul mates?
HURLEY : I guess.
LIBBY : You don't remember me, do you?
HURLEY : Should I?
DR. BROOKS : What are you doing, Elizabeth? Are you bothering this man?
LIBBY : No, no, he, he's an old friend.
HURLEY : Actually, we just, wait, what's, what's going on?
[Dr. Brooks gets Libby, unwillingly, up from her chair.]
DR. BROOKS : I apologize for the intrusion. [to Libby] Come on.
LIBBY : No, Dr. Brooks, If I could just...
HURLEY : Doctor?
DR. BROOKS : I'm sorry, she just wandered off.
HURLEY : Wandered off from where?
LIBBY : Everything that I said, Hugo, I meant it.
DR. BROOKS : Forgive us.
[Dr. Brooks escorts Libby away from the table. outside the restaurant, Spanish Johnny's, where Hurley watches as Libby waves to him as she gets into a passenger van. Dr. Brooks closes the side door. Written on it is Santa Rosa Mental Heath Institute. Hurley waves back as the van leaves the parking lot. A partial time skip is heard and the scene switches back to the island. Ilana returns to the beach camp.]
ILANA : All right, let's go. We have to make it to the outriggers and across the channel to Hydra Island before nightfall.
RICHARD : You have the dynamite?
ILANA : Four sticks, enough to destroy the cockpit and all the instruments.
[Ilana shows Richard the dynamite in her pack.]
ILANA : That plane'll never fly.
HURLEY : Um, I don't know if that's a good idea. I mean for one thing, that stuff's really unstable.
ILANA : You have to trust me. I've been training my whole life for this.
HURLEY : To blow stuff up?
ILANA : To protect you.
HURLEY : Yeah, but how is blowing up the plane protecting us?
ILANA : [rolls eyes] With that plane gone, that thing won't be able to leave the island.
HURLEY : Yeah, well, neither will we and then we'll be stuck here with it and it'll be angry at us.
[Ilana walks to the water receptacle and puts bottles of water in her pack.]
ILANA : Jacob said Richard would know what to do and Richard said to blow up the plane, correct?
RICHARD : Yes.
HURLEY : Well, Jacob never said anything about it to me. I mean, what if Richards's wrong?
ILANA : Hugo, I'm looking out for your best interests, all of you. Nothing is more important that this.
[Ilana shoves a bottle of water into the back then drops it on the ground.]
ILANA : That thing is evil, and God help us if it ever leaves this island, because if...
[The dynamite in Ilana's pack detonates resulting in a loud explosion. Everyone at the beach camp is thrown back on the ground. Ilana has exploded with the dynamite. Jack looks up and sees that she is no longer there. Hurley stares at where Ilana once stood. MIB/Locke's camp where he is making a spear from a tree branch.]
MAN : About six feet off the ground.
[Sawyer approaches MIB/Locke.]
SAWYER : That gonna be a spear?
MIB/LOCKE : I'm not sure what it's gonna be yet, James. When the time is right, it'll tell me.
SAWYER : You talk to wood now?
KATE : Sawyer.
SAWYER : What?
[Kate places down her rifle and sits.]
MIB/LOCKE : Something I can do for you two?
SAWYER : Is there something you can do? How about anything? Those bastards on the other island grabbed Jin. We're just sitting around twiddlin' our damn thumbs, doing nothing about it.
MIB/LOCKE : There's a difference between doing nothing and waiting.
KATE : So what are we waiting for?
MIB/LOCKE : [ points knife at Kate] You were only able to come back to this island because you all did it together. If we're gonna get on that plane and leave, it has to happen the same way. We're waiting for your friends to get here, Kate [pause] Hugo, Sun, Jack. That's the only way we're ever getting off this [pause] Godforsaken rock.
KATE : Well, I don't see that happening.
MIB/LOCKE : Well, let's just hope you're wrong.
[MIB/Locke catches sight of Sayid walking into the camp. Sawyer goes to meet him.]
SAWYER : Where you been?
[Sayid looks at MIB/Locke.]
SAYID : Can I speak to you in private?
[MIB/Locke stands up.]
MIB/LOCKE : Absolutely.
Sayid and MIB/Locke walk away from the campsite. People are watching and trying to understand what is happening. They walk through the foliage of the jungle.]
MIB/LOCKE : Everything go all right?
SAYID : Yes.
MIB/LOCKE : Did Widmore see you?
SAYID : No, but his people did.
MIB/LOCKE : And you let them live?
SAYID : I didn't see the point of killing them when I had what I came for.
MIB/LOCKE : So you found what they were hiding in the submarine?
SAYID : I most certainly did.
[Sayid pulls back some brush to reveal Desmond, tied to a tree. MIB/Locke slowly walks around Sayid and looks at Desmond. beach camp. Hurley approaches where Ilana camped and looks around. He picks up a worn red book, covered in sand. The book is written in Russian. The cover reads: Ф. М. Достое́вский - Записки из подполья. The English translation is: F.M. Dostoyevsky  Notes from Underground . Hurley then picks up the leather pouch that contained Jacob's ashes. He hears a ruckus and quickly closes the pouch. Richard is emptying out a pack.]
BEN : Now what?
RICHARD : We get more dynamite or else she died for nothing.
JACK : Maybe she died to show us to stay the hell away from dynamite.
RICHARD : Well, Jack, that's a risk I'm willing to take.
JACK : Richard, I promised Sun that I'd get her off this island.
RICHARD : Well, Jack, I, I wish you hadn't done that. If it makes you feel any better, you can blame it on me.
HURLEY : I think Richard's right. It's the only choice we've got. [pause] Trust me, Jack.
JACK : Okay.
RICHARD : Good, let's get moving.
[A partial time skip is heard and the scene switches back off island. Hurley's picture is on a poster dressed in Australian garb and holding a bucket of Mr. Cluck's Chicken. A man calls out a number indicating that an order is ready.]
MALE COUNTER CLERK : 38? Number 38?
[Hurley walks into the restaurant and straight to the counter.]
MALE COUNTER CLERK : Mr. Reyes! What an honor.
HURLEY : Give me a bucket, family size.
MALE COUNTER CLERK : Of course, right away, sir.
[The scene changes to Hurley sitting at a table eating the chicken and dropping the bones on a tray.]
FEMALE COUNTER CLERK :
[Hurley looks around and see Desmond watching him eat.]
HURLEY : What?
[Desmond walks over and sits at Hurley's table.]
DESMOND : I'm sorry. Have I seen you before?
HURLEY : I own the place. Maybe you saw my commercial. You want a Clucketeer keychain?
DESMOND : [chuckles] No, it's not that. Were you on Oceanic Flight 815? about a week ago from Sydney?
HURLEY : Uh, yeah.
DESMOND : So was I.
HURLEY : [blandly] Wow, what a coincidence.
DESMOND : Yeah, listen, you mind if I join you what I wait for my order?
HURLEY : Be my guest.
DESMOND : Ooh, that is a lot of chicken.
[Hurley tosses the piece of chicken he was eating back into the bucket and slides the bucket aside.]
HURLEY : I eat when I'm depressed.
DESMOND : Ah, so what's her name?
HURLEY : I met a girl on a blind date the other night.
DESMOND : And you didn't, it didn't go how you'd hoped?
[Hurley drinks his soda.]
HURLEY : Mm, she was totally awesome except for one thing, she's crazy.
DESMOND : [chuckles] Well, all women are a little bit crazy, brother.
HURLEY : No, this one actually lives in the loony bin. I mean, I saw the van. She's full on nuts. I mean, she started sane but then she told me that we already knew each other and that I'd remember.
DESMOND : Tell me something, did you believe her when she said she knew you?
HURLEY : Yeah, kinda.
DESMOND : You know, I say go with your gut. You know, maybe you should [pause] you should try to find out where she thinks she knew you from, before you give up on her.
[Hurley thinks.]
MALE COUNTER CLERK : 42? Order 42?
DESMOND : Ah, that's me brother. Well, uh, it was nice bumping into you.
[Desmond walks away from the table. A partial time skip is heard and the scene switches back to the island where Desmond is sitting and tied to a tree. MIB/Locke approaches him and crouches down so they are at eye level.]
MIB/LOCKE : Hello.
DESMOND : Hello.
MIB/LOCKE : I'm sorry Sayid tied you up but he was afraid you'd run before we had a chance to talk.
DESMOND : I don't blame him although as I explained to him before he left, I have no where to run to, brother.
MIB/LOCKE : Well, if that's not the best argument against captivity that I've ever heard I don't know what is?
[MIB/Locke cuts the ropes around Desmond's wrists and chest.]
MIB/LOCKE : You mind if I ask you a couple questions, Desmond?
DESMOND : [smiles] Not at all.
MIB/LOCKE : Why did Charles Widmore bring you back to the island?
DESMOND : Considering I was kidnapped, you'd have to ask him.
[MIB/Locke looks at Desmond then Sayid.]
SAYID : They had him under armed guard.
DESMOND : He threw me into a wood shack and blasted me with a massive amount of electromagnetism.
MIB/LOCKE : If you don't mind my asking, Desmond, how can you be sure what it was that he blasted you with?
DESMOND : Experience.
MIB/LOCKE : Do you know who I am?
DESMOND : Of course. [pause] You're John Locke.
[MIB/Locke looks at Desmond askew.]
MIB/LOCKE : [to Sayid] Head back to camp. I'll be back soon.
SAYID : Where are you going?
MIB/LOCKE : Desmond and I need to take a walk.
[Sayid turns and walks away. MIB/Locke stands up and extends his hand to Desmond.]
MIB/LOCKE : Something I'd like to show you.
[Desmond waits a moment then takes his hand. Richard, Miles, Frank, Ben, Jack and Sun walking through the jungle.]
BEN : Kinda makes you think, doesn't it?
JACK : What's that?
BEN : Ilana, there she was, hand picked by Jacob, trained to come and protect you candidates. No sooner does she tell you who you are then she blows up. The island was done with her. Makes me wonder what's gonna happen when it's done with us.
[The group continues to walk then the Black Rock comes into view. The group stops.]
RICHARD : All right everyone, this might take a few minutes. I don't want anyone but me handling that dynamite so I'm gonna go in alone. Where's Hugo?
JACK : I thought he was up front with you.
HURLEY : Run!
[Everyone turns to see Hurley running from the Black Rock.]
HURLEY : Run! Go! Go! Go! Go!
[Suddenly there is a large explosion at the Black Rock. Everyone dives for the ground. Large pieces of wood make their way through the air as deadly projectiles. A mast from the ship falls very close to the group. The Black Rock is engulfed in flames. Hugo looks then stands. He is quickly approached by Richard.]
RICHARD : Why the hell did you do that?
HURLEY : I'm protecting us.
[Hurley is now sitting on a piece of wood with Jack running interference as Richard approaches him.]
RICHARD : What the hell were you thinking?
JACK : Calm down.
RICHARD : Now what, what are we supposed to do now?
JACK : That's it. That's enough!
RICHARD : We're dead. We're all dead.
[The remnants of the Black Rock are still ablaze. Miles walks to Hurley.]
MILES : A warning might have been nice there, Hugo.
HURLEY : I did say, "run."
MILES : Why'd you do that?
HURLEY : Michael told me to.
MILES : Who?
HURLEY : Michael. He's one of the people who come back and yell at me after they die. [pause] He told me I had to stop everyone from blowing up the plane so, no dynamite, no more blowing up.
MILES : That happen a lot, dead people yelling at you?
HURLEY : It happens enough.
MILES : And you just listen to whatever they say?
HURLEY : Dead people are more reliable that alive people.
[A partial time skip is heard and the scene switches Hurley speaking with Dr. Brooks in his office at the Santa Rosa Mental Health Institute.]
DR. BROOKS : How can I help you, Mr. Reyes?
HURLEY : I wanted to ask you about that girl the other day. Libby? I was wondering if maybe I could see her.
DR. BROOKS : Well, I don't think that's a good idea. She's not well.
HURLEY : Clearly, she's well enough for like, a , fajita field trip.
DR. BROOKS : Well, that's my mistake. I misjudged her condition.
HURLEY : Her condition?
DR. BROOKS : She has issues with reality.
HURLEY : What do you mean?
DR. BROOKS : I just think it probably wouldn't be a good idea for you to see her right now. It'll only confuse her.
HURLEY : You said, "probably" which means you might make an exception.
DR. BROOKS : Well, perhaps for family.
HURLEY : or a generous donor?
DR. BROOKS : [chuckles] I'm sorry?
[Hurley takes his checkbook out of his jacket pocket, puts it on the desk and starts to write a check.]
HURLEY : The rec room looked pretty gnarly on my way in. What do you think 100K might buy?
 rec room. A man playing Connect 4 has all the disks fall to the bottom of the game board. Hurley sits at a table alone and waits. Another man standing by a window is playing with a hand held game. Another man is sitting at a table painting. A large picture is on the chalkboard. There is sun with beams, birds in the sky, a crocodile, and island with one palm tree, a red butterfly being eaten by a large head, two small fish, a shark, and a turtle. There are a few indistinguishable images, also. A woman drawing a pink butterfly with a red body on the wall turns and walks away. A door opens and a man lets Libby enter the rec room. She smiles and waves at Hurly who smiles, waves and quickly stands up. They both sit down at the table. There is a pause before either speaks.]
LIBBY : You remembered?
HURLEY : No. I'm sorry.
[Libby holds back tears.]
LIBBY : Then why are you here?
HURLEY : Where is it you think you know me from?
LIBBY : Um, I'm not sure. [sits back] I, I know it won't make sense.
HURLEY : Try me.
LIBBY : [leans forward] A few days ago I was watching TV and one of your commercials came on. And the moment that I saw you, it was like I was hit over the head. All these memories came washing back, of my life, only [pause] it was [pause] another life.
HURLEY : What kind of memories?
LIBBY : There was a plane crash and, uh, I was on an island.
HURLEY : And I was there?
LIBBY : I think so. We [pause] knew each other. We [pause] liked each other. And then when I got here, it was almost like I'd been here before and for some reason, Hugo, I have a memory of you being here, too.
[Hurley looks around.]
HURLEY : Um, this is the first time I've ever been in a mental hospital.
LIBBY : Yeah, I know, but I can't get you out of my brain. That's why the other night when I saw you, I had to talk to you because if you remembered me...
HURLEY : I wish I could, Libby, but [pause] I can't.
[Libby nods, closes her eyes and holds back tears.]
HURLEY : I'm sorry.
LIBBY : It's okay.
[Libby wipes away a tear.]
LIBBY : It's okay. [chuckles] I'm crazy.
HURLEY : Yeah, probably, but we all got something, right? I mean, it takes a lot of guts to go up to a total stranger and tell them you know them from bizarre, alternate universe.
[They smile at each other.]
HURLEY : I'm scared just saying, "hi" to a girl.
LIBBY : [chuckles] You're doing fine.
[Hurley chuckles and looks around the room again.]
HURLEY : Hey, can you ever, like get outta here? Um, on a day pass or...
LIBBY : Yeah, I'm here voluntarily.
HURLEY : Well, would you like to do something?
LIBBY : You mean [pause] a date?
HURLEY : Uh, yeah.
LIBBY : I'd love that.
[They smile at each other as a partial time skip is heard and the scene switches back to the island. MIB/Locke and Desmond are walking through the jungle.]
MIB/LOCKE : Remind me, Desmond, how long were you down in that hatch pushing that button?
DESMOND : Three years
MIB/LOCKE : And here you are, back for more. If I didn't know better, I'd say this island has it in for you.
DESMOND : Do you know better?
MIB/LOCKE : Excuse me?
DESMOND : Well, there's nothing special about me, brother. This island has it in for all of us.
[MIB/Locke stops and turns to Desmond.]
MIB/LOCKE : Yes, it does.
[MIB/Locke looks behind Desmond and he turns to look also.]
DESMOND : What?
[A boy holding a sapling stands in the offing looking at MIB/Locke. He is tall and has medium ash blonde to very light brown hair.]
DESMOND : Who's that?
[MIB/Locke says nothing as he stares at the boy.]
MIB/LOCKE : Just ignore him.
[MIB/Locke motions for Desmond to follow him and starts walking. Desmond looks back at the boy.]
DESMOND : Do you know that boy?
MIB/LOCKE : [angry] I said ignore him.
[The boy smiles, lets go of the tree and runs away. Desmond turns to MIB/Locke and start walking. the burning Black Rock. Richard picks up a pack
JACK : Where you going?
[Richard hands the pack to Ben and ignores Jack.]
RICHARD : Ben, back at the Dharma barracks, there's still grenades there? Explosives?
BEN : Yes, I think so.
RICHARD : Then that's were we're going.
JACK : Maybe we should talk about his a minute.
RICHARD : [sarcastically] Walk? There's no time to talk but if you know what we need to do, if you know how to stop that thing from leaving the island without blowing up that plane up, then let's hear it. Let's all hear it.
HURLEY : I know what we need to do.
RICHARD : Really? What's that?
HURLEY : We have to go talk to Locke.
RICHARD : Are you trying to get us killed?
HURLEY : It's not my idea. It's his.
[Hurley points to the foliage at no one.]
HURLEY : Jacob says we have to talk to Locke.
RICHARD : Jacob's here right now?
HURLEY : Yeah.
[Richard turns to look.]
RICHARD : Ask him what the island is.
HURLEY : What?
RICHARD : A while back, Jacob told me what the island was and if he's really standing here right next to me then just ask him.
[Hurley walks next to Richard and stops. His back is to everyone except Richard.]
HURLEY : [firmly] I don't have to prove anything to you, Richard. You can come with me or you can keep trying to blow stuff up. Your call, dude.
[Richard looks at Hurley then turns to the other people.]
RICHARD : He's lying. Jacob isn't telling us what to do because Jacob never tells us what to do. I'm gonna make this simple, it that thing leaves the island that's it. I, it's over.
MILES : What's over?
RICHARD : Everything. I'm destroying that plane and I can use all the help I can get. Who's coming with me?
[Richard looks at Ben, Sun and Frank. Ben grabs his pack and gets up first.]
BEN : I am.
[Miles follows Ben.]
MILES : [to Hurley] I saw that thing in action, man. It doesn't want to talk. Sorry.
RICHARD : Anyone else?
[Frank looks at Richard and shakes his head indicating no. Sun says nothing and looks away from Richard.]
JACK : Sorry, Richard. If Jacob says we go talk to Locke, we go talk to Locke. I'm going with Hugo.
HURLEY : Really?
[Jack nods yes.]
RICHARD : Don't get in our way.
[Richard, Ben and Miles leave the group and walk into the jungle. Jack stands up and puts his backpack on.]
JACK : All right, Hurley. Let's go talk to Locke.
[It is now night time. Hurley leads Jack, Sun and Frank through the jungle. Sun stops to write a note and shows Frank.]
SUN : [note] Did we make a mistake?
[Frank raises his eyebrows.]
FRANK : Probably.
[Sun starts walking and Frank follows.]
HURLEY : So what do you think we should [pause] say to Locke when we get there? I mean, how do you break the ice with the smoke monster?
JACK : Don't worry about it. Something tells me he's gonna do most of the talking.
HURLEY : Or he could just kill us all.
JACK : Yeah, he could.
[Hurley stops and quickly turns around to face Jack.]
HURLEY : I didn't see Jacob back there. Uh, I just said it 'cause I wanted everyone to listen to me.
JACK : I know.
HURLEY : Then why'd you come with me.
JACK : Ever since Juliet died, ever since I got her killed, all I've wanted was to fix it. But I can't. I can't ever fix it. You have no idea how hard it is for me to sit back and listen to other people tell me what I should do. But, I think maybe that's the point. Maybe [pause] maybe I'm supposed to let go.
HURLEY : Unless you letting go gets us killed. Going to see Locke was my idea, not Jacob's.
JACK : Hurley, you asked me to trust you. This is me trusting you.
HURLEY : Well, it's a good thing you do, dude, 'cause I have no idea where I'm going.
[Frank and Sun catch up with Jack and Hurley. Suddenly the whispers start and everyone looks for the source. Jack and Frank draw their rifles. Jack is ready to fire and Frank is holding his rifle waist high.]
HURLEY : Wait, it's cool. I think I know what these things are.
FRANK : Oh, yeah? What the hell are they?
HURLEY : Wait here.
[Hurley leaves the group a walks back into the jungle. The scene changes to Hurley stopping at a clearing.]
HURLEY : Hey, you around? Michael?
[Michael walks up behind Hurley as he quickly turns around.]
HURLEY : You're stuck on the island, aren't you?
MICHAEL : Because of what I did.
HURLEY : And [pause] there are others out here [pause] like you, aren't there? That's what the whispers are?
MICHAEL : Yeah, we're the ones who can't move on.
HURLEY : Do you know where Locke is?
[Michael turns and points to a glow of a small fire in the distance.]
MICHAEL : There.
HURLEY : Thanks. Is [pause] is there anything I can do to help you?
MICHAEL : Don't get yourself killed.
HURLEY : Okay.
[Hurley starts to walk away and stops.]
MICHAEL : And, Hurley? If you ever do see Libby again [pause] tell her I'm very sorry.
HURLEY : I'll be sure and do that, dude.
[A partial time skip is heard and the scene switches off island where Hurley is putting a blanket on a beach. Libby is with him. Hurly has a picnic basket. They sit on the blanket. Other people are sunbathing on the beach.]
HURLEY : I got, like, six different kinds of cheeses. I don't even know what they are, but the lady at the store said they were good, so, I figured you'd like cheese because everybody likes cheese.
[Hurley unpacks the basket ads Libby looks out at the waves.]
HURLEY : Is something wrong?
LIBBY : No, not wrong, just [pause] off.
HURLEY : Have you been here before?
LIBBY : No. It's just being here with you feels so familiar. It's like a date we never had. Wow, I sound completely insane, don't I?
HURLEY : No, not completely.
LIBBY : Why do you even wanna be with me?
HURLEY : Why you wanna be with me?
LIBBY : What?
HURLEY : Come on. Look at me.
LIBBY : I want to be with you because I like you.
HURLEY : Yeah, but you like me because well, you're, delusional.
[Libby leans over and kisses Hurley. As their lips meet, Hurley has island flashbacks. They are:
Libby wearing a red shirt and her hair down,
Libby laughing and putting her arms on Hurley's chest playfully,
Libby putting her arms around Hurley,
Libby and Hurley kissing.]
[Return top real time. As the kiss ends, Libby moves back and Hurley has his eyes wide open.]
LIBBY : What? What's wrong?
HURLEY : [pause] Whoa, dude.
LIBBY : What?
HURLEY : [pause] I, I think I'm remembering stuff.
LIBBY : You are?
[Hurley nods.]
LIBBY : You mean I'm not crazy?
HURLEY : No, I don't think you are.
[Libby leans over and hugs Hurley. A car is parked and the driver is watching them. It is Desmond, watching with his sunglasses lowered on the bridge of his nose. He pushes his glasses up, smiles and drives away. MIB/Locke and Desmond walking through the jungle at night.]
MIB/LOCKE : We're here.
DESMOND : What is it?
MIB/LOCKE : It's a well.
[MIB/Locke moves his head indicating for Desmond to come closer. Desmond walks to the well as MIB/Locke follows him. Desmond puts his hands on the stone wall that make up the well. MIB/Locke drops his backpack on the ground. He lights another torch.]
MIB/LOCKE : Let me guess, you're wondering how deep it is.
DESMOND : [laughs] You read my mind.
[MIB/Locke drops one of the torches down the well. It falls until it is out of sight then hits water and goes out.]
MIB/LOCKE : You have any idea who old this well is, Desmond?
DESMOND : Very old?
MIB/LOCKE : That's exactly right, very old. So old, in fact, that the people who dug this well did it completely by hand. God knows how long it took 'em.
DESMOND : Well, it seems like a lot of work just to get some water.
MIB/LOCKE : Oh, they weren't looking for water. They were looking for answers. A long time ago, places like the one we're standing at right now, made compass needles spin and the people holding the compasses needed to know why, so they dug.
[MIB/Locke continues to circle the wall and he approaches Desmond from Desmond's left side.]
DESMOND : Did they find what they were looking for?
MIB/LOCKE : No, they didn't.
[MIB/Locke sets his torch down on the well wall.]
MIB/LOCKE : The reason I wanted you to see this, Desmond, is because Charles Widmore is not interested in answers. He's only interested in power and he brought you back to this island so that you could help him find what he's looking for. After all, this isn't the only well.
DESMOND : And that's the reason you wanted me to see this?
MIB/LOCKE : Why aren't you afraid?
DESMOND : Excuse me?
MIB/LOCKE : You're out here, middle of the jungle, with me. Not a person on earth even knows you're here. Why aren't you afraid?
DESMOND : [calmly] What is the point in being afraid?
[Confused, MIB/Locke starts to mouth words then stops. He is intent on looking Desmond in the eyes. He smiles, then scowls as Desmond smiles at him. Suddenly, MIB/Locke grabs Desmond and throws him down the well, head first.]
DESMOND : AAH!
[Quickly the scene switches back to MIB/Locke's camp. He walks back into camp alone and tosses the torch in the fire.]
SAYID : How is our friend?
MIB/LOCKE : We don't have to worry about him anymore.
[Sayid walks away from MIB/Locke and Sawyer approaches him.]
SAWYER : Where you been?
MIB/LOCKE : I went for a walk, James.
SAWYER : Well, now that you've stretched your legs, maybe you can...
[Sawyer stop mid-sentence and he looks at someone entering the camp site. It is Hurley.]
SAWYER : Son of a bitch.
[Hurley walks into the camp keeping a distance from MIB/Locke.]
HURLEY : Um, hey.
MIB/LOCKE : Hello, Hugo.
HURLEY : I don't know who you are, dude, or what you want, but we have to talk to you.
MIB/LOCKE : [raises eyebrows] We?
HURLEY : There are other people with me. The thing is, you got weapons and we got weapons and I don't want anyone to get hurt [pause] or killed. So we're not gonna do anything and I want your word that you're not gonna do anything either.
[MIB/Locke turns and looks at Sayid. He takes his knife from its sheath and hands it to Hurley.]
MIB/LOCKE : You have my word.
[Hurley takes the knife.]
HURLEY : Okay guys. Come on out.
[Frank enters the camp first, followed by Sun and Jack. Sun looks around for Jin. The people at the campsite still have their weapons aimed at Hurley and his companions. Claire stands with Sayid as Kate stands with Sawyer.
MIB/LOCKE : Hello, Jack.
[MIB/Locke smirks. off island. Locke is using his wheelchair to get to his van in the parking lot of the school he is a substitute at. The school bell rings. Desmond is sitting in his car watching Locke. Suddenly there is a knock on the driver's window. Desmond rolls it down.]
BEN : Hello there. Are you waiting for someone in particular?
DESMOND : [lowers sunglasses] Excuse me?
BEN : Well, I noticed you've been parked here a while watching the kids, and well, it is a school.
[Desmond laughs.]
BEN : Do you have a child who goes here?
DESMOND : No, no, I was, um, uh, I just moved to the neighborhood and, um, and, uh, I'm looking for a school for my son.
BEN : What's your son's name?
DESMOND : Charlie.
BEN : Well, as a teacher here, I can vouch for it completely. It's a wonderful school.
DESMOND : That's great to hear, thanks. Well, it was nice talking to you.
BEN : Have a good day.
[Locke continues to cross the parking lot in his wheelchair. Desmond never takes his eyes off Locke. Desmond starts the car engine and peals out of the parking space. He times it so that he will reach the intersection at the same time Locke crosses it. Desmond speeds along the street and hits Locke broadside as he is stopped in the intersection. Desmond smirks as Locke flies out of the wheelchair on the hood of the car, bounces up and along the roof, rolls down the rear window onto the trunk lid and finally is thrown from the car onto the street. Locke skids as he makes contact with the pavement.]
WOMAN : OH!
[People are shouting indistinctly as Locke is having spasms on the pavement. Desmond looks in his rear view mirror emotionless and drives away. Ben runs to assist Locke.]
BEN : Call 9-1-1! Do it now!
[People start to gather around Locke.]
BEN : Mr. Locke? Oh, my God. Don't, don't move. We're gonna get you to the hospital. Mr. Locke? Mr. Locke, can you hear me?
[Locke opens his eyes and tries to get his bearings. His head is cut and blood is flowing down the side of his face.]
LOST logo
END

thread.title: Hillary Clinton Wins Democratic Woman Of The Year Award
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Wins Democratic Woman Of The Year Award - Bodybuilding.com Forums

posts.author: Fang2
posts.text:
Originally Posted by Procta u wot m8
Hillary Clinton won the Democratic Woman of the Year Award this past Thursday. As the New York Times reports, Clinton brought her admiring audience at the Women’s National Democratic Club to tears.
Award presenter Nuchhi Currier could barely contain her emotion when she remembered the last presidential election produced a result that was “very different from what had been anticipated.”
Especially after Clinton secured the nomination through a rigged process, former Democratic National Committee chairwoman Donna Brazile alleged in a Politico interview. That assessment was quietly but firmly endorsed by left-leaning Democratic Sen. Elizabeth Warren.
The negative talk apparently didn’t faze Clinton. She told the crowd, “I got more votes than anybody except Barack Obama in 2008,” as she again insisted her popular vote overshadowed Trump’s victory in the Electoral College.
Clinton, who has been on a transnational book tour for the last two months, recited most of the talking points from her promotional appearances: she trashed the Trump administration, raised the spectre of Russian interference in the presidential election and said she was a victim of sexism.
“The double standard that applies to women in politics is alive and well,” Clinton told Democratic Sen. Dianne Feinstein in what was billed as a fireside chat. “‘Ambitious’ is a compliment for men and it’s not for women.”
Clinton received the award “in recognition of her extraordinary contributions to American politics and international affairs, as well as the inspiration she has provided to women and girls around the world.”
Clinton hawked her book in her 55-minute acceptance speech, which was for sale at the event. There were even T-shirts available for the faithful, with a picture of Clinton above the words, “The People’s Choice.”
http://dailycaller.com/2017/11/03/hi..._medium=Social
Hillary Clinton Gets an Award and Tears Are Shed

posts.title: دمبله به ال‎کلاسیکو می‏‎رسد
posts.text:
قاصدک 24، بلیط ارزان هواپیما 
به گزارش بولتن نیوز ، عثمانه دمبله ، مهاجم تازه‎وارد تیم فوتبال بارسلونا که به محض شروع بازی‎های لیگ به دلیل مصدومیت فرصت زیادی برای بازی کردن پیدا نکرد و مصدوم شد خبرهای خوبی برای هواداران دارد. 
او در بازی مقابل ختافه در ماه سپتامبر دچار مصدومیتی جدی شد. مصدومیتی که جراحی نیاز داشت و گفته شد او تا بعد از ژانویه به بازی‎هایش بارسا نمی‏رسد. اما ستاره فرانسوی همان طور که قول داده بود برای بازگشت زودتر از موعد تلاش می‎کند. تنها سوال این است که او دقیقه چه زمانی برای بازی کردن آماده می‏شود؟ 
بارسلونا قرار است ۲۳ دسامبر در ال‎کلاسیکو به مصاف رئال مادرید برود و ارنستو والورده دوست دارد بتواند از این بازیکن در آن بازی حساس استفاده کند. البته این هم واضح است که بازیکن سابق دورتموند جدا از بازگشت باید برای بازی کردن هم آماده باشد و شرایط مناسبی داشته باشد تا شانس بازی کردن برای او بیشتر شود. 
البته که بارسلونا صدرنشین لیگ است و با تیم‎های بعد از خودش در جدول فاصله زیادی دارد. این یعنی نیازی به عجله کردن بازیکن فرانسوی نیست. اما خودش دوست دارد هرچه زودتر دوباره در کنار مسی قرار گیرد. منبع: خبرگزاری مهر
